name: Plant
description: A growing plant or tree, representing natural growth, patience, and the cycles of life.

person: Someone who nurtures growth and has patience for natural development
A person who becomes stagnant or overgrown with bad habits
creatureTrap: Plant creatures or beings connected to natural growth
Entangling vines, poisonous plants, or overgrown hazardous terrain
place: Fertile areas rich in natural resources and healing plants
Overgrown areas where nature has become wild and dangerous
treasure: Natural remedies, herbs, or items that grow in value over time
Resources that are seasonal or require specific conditions to obtain
situation: Gradual growth and development leading to positive outcomes
Stagnation or being overwhelmed by unchecked growth
